SEARCH
Package fr.uge.gitclout.api

Class GitService

java.lang.Object
fr.uge.gitclout.api.GitService
@Singleton public class GitService extends Object
GitService class for handling Git repository operations. Provides functionality to fetch data from external sources, process repositories, and retrieve repository information from a database.
Author:
Tagnan Tremellat

      Returns:

      Retrieves a repository by its ID.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
